info.name: Spinal cord, lateral horn
info.description: The lateral horn of the spinal cord is AKA the intermediolateral cell column. It is a small, pointed, lateral extension of the gray matter from T1 through L2 or L3 that is composed of preganglionic sympathetic neurons.
info.item: /Sections/Thin, Spinal Cord to Cerebrum/4 Thoracic cord
